trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Laval
There were no other sightings in Laval on or around September 2nd 2012
Summary: Observed a white circular object reflecting the sun. Moving fast, perfectly round.
divs: sighting detailsnote: submitted by field investigator. on sept. 2,2012, i was sitting outside in my backyard playing with my dog and as i sat back i noticed a white orb over top of my roof at a 60 degree angle west of where i was sitting. i looked twice to make sure nothing was wrong with my eyesight and realized that i was really seeing what i was seeing. i would describe it as white orb ( or disk) that was moving at a constant pace coming from the east and going towards the west. it was around 6:15 pm. the sighting lasted for not more than a minute until it disappeared behind the roof in front of my house. it seemed like the sun was reflecting on its surface. i was sure it was not a plane or helicopter because of its perfectly round shape and also because of its speed. i was not sure if it could have been a weather balloon since there is a small airport not far from where i live and there is one across the river in terrebonne. i was so intrigued by what i saw that i looked on the internet for reports of ufo sightings and this is when i found your association so this is why i contacted you. \lr
